org.jnosql.diana.api.column

Interface ColumnQuery


  • public interface ColumnQuery
    Class that contains information to do a query to ColumnEntity
    See Also:
    ColumnFamilyManager.find(ColumnQuery), ColumnCondition, Sort

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnQuery addColumn(String column)
      Add column to be either retrieve or deleted, if empty will either returns all elements in a find query or delete all elements in a column family entity.
      ColumnQuery addSort(Sort sort)
      Add the order how the result will returned
      ColumnQuery and(ColumnCondition condition)
      Appends a new condition in the query using ColumnCondition.and(ColumnCondition)
      String getColumnFamily()
      The column family name
      List<String> getColumns()
      Returns the columns
      Optional<ColumnCondition> getCondition()
      The conditions that contains in this ColumnQuery
      long getLimit()
      Returns the max number of row in a query
      List<Sort> getSorts()
      The sorts that contains in this ColumnQuery
      long getStart()
      Gets when the result starts
      static ColumnQuery of(String columnFamily)
      Creates a ColumnQuery
      ColumnQuery or(ColumnCondition condition)
      Appends a new condition in the query using ColumnCondition.or(ColumnCondition)
      void setLimit(long limit)
      Sets the max number of row in a query, if negative the value will ignored
      void setStart(long start)
      Setter to start a query
      ColumnDeleteQuery toDeleteQuery()
      Converts this to ColumnDeleteQuery
